SEARCH

Class Bank

java.lang.Object
Bank
public class Bank extends Object
The Bank class represents a bank that manages a list of accounts, PIN validation, and account balance.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Bank(String bankname)
    Default constructor that initializes the Bank object with a bank name and an empty list of accounts.

      public void validatePIN(int accountNumber, int PIN)
      Validates the PIN with the following accountNumber's pin and print the outcome.
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - The following accountNumber to validate pin.
      PIN - The pin to validate.

    • getAccountBalance

      public void getAccountBalance(int accountNumber, Currency currency)
      Gets the account balance and prints the following accountNumber's balance.
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - The following accountNumber to find the balance.
      currency - The currency of the balance to show

    • convertCurrency

      public void convertCurrency(int accountNumber, Currency currency, double amount)
      Converts the given amount from the given currency to SGD.
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - The account number to convert the currency.
      currency - The currency of the amount to be converted.
      amount - The amount to be converted.

    • applyLoan

      public void applyLoan(Loan loan, int accountNumber)
      Apply Loan
      Parameters:
      loan - The loan details.
      accountNumber - The account number that is linked to the loan.

    • getLoan

      public Loan getLoan(int accountNumber)
      Gets the Loan
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - The account number tied to the loan.
      Returns:
      The loan details. Returns null if there is no loan available.
